1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

### Actual Behavior
A clear description of what actually happened.

### Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

- OS: [e.g. Windows 11, macOS 14]
